results.title: Metformin Treatment for Diabetes Mellitus Correlates with Progression and Survival in Colorectal Carcinoma
results.text_hl: Survival in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ subgroup was longer, particularly in @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003110 @@@CRC@@@.

results.title: Metformin-induced reductions in tumor growth involves modulation of the gut microbiome
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ with syngeneic @CELLLINE_CVCL:B288 @@@MC38@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003110 @@@colon adenocarcinomas@@@ were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or feces obtained from control or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Bisphosphonates Zometa and Fosamax Synergize with Metformin to Prevent AOM-Induced Colon Cancer in F344 Rat Model.
results.text_hl: Overall, our results suggest that the combination of low doses of @CHEMICAL_Zoledronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077211 @@@zometa@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@fosamax@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed synergistic effect and significantly inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003110 @@@colon adenocarcinoma@@@ incidence and multiplicity.

citations.NLM: Madka V, Kumar G, Pathuri G, Zhang Y, Lightfoot S, Asch AS, Mohammed A, Steele VE, Rao CV. Bisphosphonates Zometa and Fosamax Synergize with Metformin to Prevent AOM-Induced Colon Cancer in F344 Rat Model. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2020 Feb;13(2):185-194. PMID: 31699708

results.title: Diclofenac and metformin synergistic dose dependent inhibition of hamster fibrosarcoma, rescued with mebendazole.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @CHEMICAL_Diclofenac @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004008 @@@diclofenac@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ demonstrated antiproliferative effects in hamster @DISEASE_Fibrosarcoma @DISEASE_MESH:D005354 @@@fibrosarcoma@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:1915 @@@BHK-21/C13@@@, human @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@lung carcinoma@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:0023 @@@A549@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:M023 @@@CCL-185@@@), @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003110 @@@colon carcinoma@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:0320 @@@HT-29@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:A8FQ @@@HTB-38@@@) and @DISEASE_Uterine_Cervical_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D002583 @@@cervical carcinoma@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:0030 @@@HeLa@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:M023 @@@CCL-2@@@) cell cultures, with markedly lower @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@ in the normal fetal lung @CELLLINE_CVCL:0440 @@@MRC-5@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Popović DJ, Popović KJ, Miljković D, Popović JK, Lalošević D, Poša M, Dolićanin Z, Čapo I. Diclofenac and metformin synergistic dose dependent inhibition of hamster fibrosarcoma, rescued with mebendazole. Biomed Pharmacother. 2023 Sep 20;167():115528. PMID: 37738800

results.title: Metformin and aspirin treatment could lead to an improved survival rate for Type 2 diabetic patients with stage II and III colorectal adenocarcinoma relative to non-diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: The findings support the hypothesis of a possible inhibitory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@ASA@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003110 @@@CRC@@@ cells.

results.title: Metformin prevents hormonal and metabolic disturbances and 1,2-dimethylhydrazine-induced colon carcinogenesis in non-diabetic rats
results.text_hl: The two @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ doses did not affect @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003110 @@@colon carcinoma@@@ incidence in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ rectums and descending colons.
